newsitem.title: GERMANY: German DAX ends bourse at record close, off 3,000.
newsitem.headline: German DAX ends bourse at record close, off 3,000.

text.p: 1237 GMT - Germany's DAX index ends bourse at new record, led up by the futures market. But index fails to reach key 3,000 level despite coming within two points of the target.
* DAX closes up 4.86 points at 2,993.31 points, off session low of 2,970.45. Sets new all-time intraday high of 2,998.61.
* March DTB DAX futures up 19 points at 3,009.0.
* Deutsche, Commerzbank, Dresdner and other bank shares all in favour.
* BASF AG, other chemicals, in decline.
* New assault on 3,000 level seen ahead.
* Attention on Wall Street opening, U.S. jobs data.
